adjectives.description: underrated (comparative more underrated, superlative most underrated)

entries.meaning: Not given enough recognition for its quality
examples: Koeman identified Southamptonâ€™s third as their finest goal of the game. Jack Cork, the most underrated player at a much-lauded club, swept the ball out wide to Tadic, who waited for Cork to run to the back post before chipping the ball across to him to slam in a deserved goal from close range, despite an attempted block by Vito Mannone.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of underrate
